text: Mariano Peña Spanish actor at the photocall of Alice in Wonderland in 2010 Mariano Peña García (born 7 April 1960) is a Spanish regular and voice actor, mostly known for his role as Mauricio Colmenero in Aída and Benito Benjumea in Allí abajo. ==References== ==External links== * Category:People from Huelva Category:1960 births Category:21st-century Spanish male actors Category:Living people Category:Spanish male actors
title: Mariano Peña
